name: Locl Interactive, Inc.
description: Developer of a customer experience automation platform designed to automate conversational artificial intelligence and workflow. The company's platform permits the building, training, and hosting of digital assistants and bots using bot flow abstraction and features conversational framework, analytics, and tools for integration with messenger applications, enabling businesses and brands to reduce operational costs and expand customer experience capabilities.
one_liner: Developer of a customer experience automation platform designed to automate conversational artificial intelligence and workflow. The company's platform permits the building, training, and hosting of digital assistants and bots using bot flow abstraction and features conversational framework, analytics, and tools for integration with messenger applications, enabling businesses and brands to reduce operational costs and expand customer experience capabilities.
